entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
